attributes.action: Say HARD BREXIT let Barnet and EU countries fret. Return under our terms.
attributes.background: We will not accept Brexit Remains or EU to hold us to ransom. Remainers meeting EU behind our backs are in act of treason.Do not attend next EU Brexit meeting, send letter stating we are to take a HARD BREXIT let Barnier and EU countries fret. Return under our terms. BREXIT IS BREXIT.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. If you want the UK to leave the EU immediately without a deal, you may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/200165
